top_comments.comment: *trumputin not having a good day today!*

I always liked Kennedy's comment when the media at the time and the Nixon campaign called him the Catholic candidate for President.  Kennedy famously replied "I am NOT the Catholic candidate for President.  I am the DEMOCRATIC candidate who just happens to be Catholic."
